headline: SentinelOne raises annual revenue forecast on strong cybersecurity demand
summary: SentinelOne raised annual revenue forecast on Thursday, a sign of growing demand for the company's cybersecurity tools, sending its shares surging around 9% in extended trading. The company's artificial intelligence-powered Singularity platform ingests and analyzes security data in real time, automates threat detection and responses, and aims to reduce manual work for security teams. A wave of cyberattacks has hit global companies, including Microsoft, UnitedHealth Group, Walt Disney and Oracle, prompting the need for robust security solutions.

A wave of cyberattacks has hit global companies, including Microsoft, UnitedHealth Group, Walt Disney and Oracle, prompting the need for robust security solutions.

headline: Asian Television Network Applauds Landmark Ruling in Canadian Digital Piracy Case
summary: Asian Television Network International Limited (ATN) (TSXV: SAT), Canada's largest South Asian broadcaster and a long-standing advocate for protecting the rights of creators, applauds the recent Ontario court ruling that sentenced two individuals to five years in prison for contempt of court after refusing to comply with orders in a long-running digital piracy case.

headline: Can ROKU Channel Push Shares Higher After 19.8% 6-Month Rally?
summary: ROKU rises 19.8% over 6 months on strength in Roku Channel, but elevated valuation suggests holding existing positions while waiting for better entry points in 2025.

raw.headline: Can ROKU Channel Push Shares Higher After 19.8% 6-Month Rally?
raw.summary: ROKU rises 19.8% over 6 months on strength in Roku Channel, but elevated valuation suggests holding existing positions while waiting for better entry points in 2025.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper and Disney Advertising Join Forces to Redefine the Playbook for Connected Consumer Experiences
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ: KDP) today announced a strategic advertising collaboration with Disney Advertising that will redefine the connected consumer experience. The companies will deliver groundbreaking personalized experiences at every touchpoint of the consumer journey through a unique integration of fandom, media and shopper insights.

headline: Video Production Market Global Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 | Armaan Productions, Brafton, CBS , 20thCentury, Gardner, Levitate Media, Skeleton, Sony, Walt Disney, Universal
summary: The global video production market is projected to soar to $865.37 billion by 2033, up from $83.55 billion in 2024, driven by a CAGR of 29.66% between 2025 and 2033. The surge in digital content across corporate, marketing, entertainment, and educational sectors, alongside advancements in production technologies such as 4K, AI, and cloud-based tools, fuels this expansion. headline: Nvidia CEO praises open-source AI as enterprises deploy GPU servers
summary: “Open-source models are opening up large enterprises, SaaS companies, industrial companies, robotics companies to now join the AI revolution,” Jensen Huang said.

raw.headline: Nvidia CEO praises open-source AI as enterprises deploy GPU servers

headline: Bath & Body Works posts quarterly profit miss as costs weigh
summary: Shares of the beauty and skincare retailer slumped 6% in premarket trading.  U.S. consumer spending rose in June and July but growth in the third quarter this year is expected to be constrained by a softening labor market and higher prices of goods.  Bath & Body Works, however, is largely insulated from the tariffs, given it sources the majority of its merchandise locally, unlike many of its peers.

headline: NVIDIA Q2 Profit Soars 59% as Blackwell AI Surge Fuels Record Revenue
summary: NVIDIA reported Q2 revenue of $46.7 billion, up 56% year-on-year, with profit surging 59% on booming demand for its Blackwell AI platform.
